posts.post_content:
Have approximately 450 T-206 cards that I am selling for a client. These cards vary in condition, and I am also in the process of having some of the better condition cards graded. Thought I would test the waters of interest by scanning this Griffin (San Francisco) Obak card and see what kind of offers I get on it. Please PM me with any and all offers. I will be listing many more of these great cards on here over the next few weeks, giving the forum members a shot at them before they hit Ebay. If you have any questions, please PM or email me. I have a 100% perfect feedback rating on Ebay (NVSB), and am active on the PSA BST boards (wcsportscards94558)
Thanks!
Tom


[IMG]http://i452.photobucket.com/albums/qq246/nvsb/GriffinObakFront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i452.photobucket.com/albums/qq246/nvsb/GriffinObakBack.jpg[/IMG]

Some info for ya.

Not a T206 but rather T212.

This one's a 1910.  It's 150 back which is harder to find so a bit more cash there.

Feel free to ask more questions.

Rob

Selling this card for $40 dlvd in a bubble mailer with delivery confirmation. If interested, please PM me to reserve
Thanks
